mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.*, ROWNUM rnum FROM ( SELECT * FROM entry_entr_bar where LINK_ID = #{link_id} ORDER BY
TO_NUMBER(REGEXP_SUBSTR(entry_entr_bar_id, '\d+'))
instl_lc
instl_de
model_nm
ASC
DESC
) a ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{offset} + 1 AND #{offset} + #{limit}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM entry_entr_bar WHERE LINK_ID = #{link_id}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ENTRY_ENTR_BAR_STTUS WHERE LINK_ID = #{link_id}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ENTRY_ENTR_BAR_FAULT_HISTORY WHERE LINK_ID = #{link_id}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ENTRY_ENTR_BAR_RUN_HISTORY WHERE LINK_ID = #{link_id}
mapper.insert: insert into entry_entr_bar(entry_entr_bar_id, MODEL_NM, X_CRDNT, Y_CRDNT, link_id, instl_lc, instl_de) values(#{entry_entr_bar_id}, #{link_id}, #{model_nm}, #{x_crdnt}, #{y_crdnt}, #{instl_lc}, #{instl_de})
mapper.update: update entry_entr_bar set instl_lc = #{instl_lc}, instl_de = #{instl_de} where entry_entr_bar_id = #{entry_entr_bar_id} and LINK_ID = #{link_id}

update ENTRY_ENTR_BAR_STTUS set AUTO_REMOTE_STTUS = #{auto_remote_sttus}, RUN_STTUS = #{run_sttus}, RISING_STTUS = #{rising_sttus}, DESN_STTUS = #{desn_sttus}, FAULT_STTUS = #{fault_sttus}, COMN_FAULT = #{comn_fault} where entry_entr_bar_id = #{entry_entr_bar_id} and LINK_ID = #{link_id}
mapper.delete: delete from entry_entr_bar where entry_entr_bar_id = #{entry_entr_bar_id} and LINK_ID = #{link_id}
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.*, ROWNUM rnum FROM ( SELECT * FROM ENTRY_ENTR_BAR_STTUS where LINK_ID = #{link_id} ORDER BY
TO_NUMBER(REGEXP_SUBSTR(entry_entr_bar_id, '\d+'))
auto_remote_sttus
run_sttus
rising_sttus
desn_sttus
fault_sttus
comn_fault
ASC
DESC
) a ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{offset} + 1 AND #{offset} + #{limit}
mapper.update: update ENTRY_ENTR_BAR_FAULT_HISTORY set FAULT_END_DATETIME = #{fault_end_datetime} where entry_entr_bar_id = #{entry_entr_bar_id} and LINK_ID = #{link_id} and FAULT_START_DATETIME = #{fault_start_datetime}
update ENTRY_ENTR_BAR_RUN_HISTORY set RUN_END_DATETIME = #{run_end_datetime} where entry_entr_bar_id = #{entry_entr_bar_id} and LINK_ID = #{link_id} and RUN_START_DATETIME = #{run_start_datetime}
